page.title: 13Youth Club,High Lorton
page.content: Every Wednesday from 7 p.m. till 9 p.m. we have a{Youth Club}in the village hall.It is for anyone in the area{aged 8 to 16,}not just for this village. In summer we usually go down to the village playing-field to play{cricket, {football}or{rounders.}When it's winter we stay in the hall and play{volley- {ball}or hold{darts,snooker}and{table- {tennis}competitions.Sometimes we go on {trips}to places like Alton Towers or Lockerbie Ice-rink.At Easter we have {egg-dumping}competitions (it's a bit like conkers,but using hard-boiled eggs).We sometimes have a{bonfire and {barbecue}with Embleton Youth Club in one of the local fields and every so often we go on a{treasure-hunt}around the village.If you win,you get a free drink and bag of crisps.
